div.p: Security labels with physically unclonble flower-like patterns. Typical fluorescence images of inkjet-printed macroscopic letters FZU composed of a red, b green, and c blue emission dot patterns (the scale bar is 4000 μm), d– f their local enlarged images (the scale bar is 500 μm), and g– i further enlarged images (the scale bar is 100 μm). All the samples are printed under the same conditions. The FZU patterns are identical on macroscale but completely different at the microscale (i.e., every dot pattern is unique)
